title: Outlook Office Font Errors
content:
Hi,

On my company's Outlook (365), when I start a new email the font on the first line *says* that it's Calibri - like I set in my email settings - but it appears to be an entirely different font. Also in Outlook, when I type 1st it changes the '1' and the 's' to superscript, makes the 't' regular sized, and will not allow me to place a space after the 't'. I have to hit 'enter', then space, then continue typing and then go back and remove the 'enter'.

In OneDrive, I'll open it from the 9 dots at the top left of Outlook and OneDrive will load. However, a moment later it often asks me to 'sign in', even though I've clearly been signed in for some time. Sometimes I can bypass it, but often the page won't work right until I click the 'sign in' pop-up. Then, it disappears, refreshes the page and it works fine; without me actually signing in.

I bring these two issues up at the same time, because they began at the same time. I believe it started in January or early February, if that helps. I waited to seek help, expecting it could have been caused by a recent update that would be corrected later. I recently saw that Firefox released an update and my browser auto-updated, but the issues persist.

I've reached out to Microsoft for support on this and we found the issues only occurred in Firefox, so I'm here to ask for some help, please.

Thanks.

title: Login-password info read by browser extensions?
content:
I was shocked to just now review "permissions" for the 2 Firefox extensions I have installed - an ad blocker and an RSS feed reader - and see that both have "Access your data for all websites" permission.

Looking that up, I found that means, "The extension could READ the content of any web page you visit, as well as data you enter into those web pages, such as USERNAMES and PASSWORDS!"

Seriously?

I realize Mozilla can read login and password info, but why in the world does an ad blocker or feed reader need the ability to read logins and passwords?

I realize login data may be practically impossible to separate from other FORM data, YET neither an ad blocker nor a feed reader should need to read page FORM INPUT data anyway!

Looks to me like Mozilla is being way too lax in allowing extension permissions not needed.

In particular, if any extension can read account login and password data, there should be a pop-up warning, and IMO such should not be allowed where not required.

title: Baixar Freecine APK – Installation, Streaming, and Download Issues
content:
I have been using Baixar Freecine APK to stream and download movies and TV shows, but recently, I have encountered multiple issues.

Installation Issues:

The APK file is not installing on my Android device.

It shows an "App Not Installed" error.

Sometimes, the app installs but crashes upon opening.

Streaming Problems:

Videos do not load properly, and buffering takes too long.

Some movies or TV shows display a "Content Not Available" error.

The app keeps disconnecting from the internet even when the connection is stable.

Download Failures:

Unable to download movies or TV series within the app.

Downloaded files do not appear in the device storage.

Some downloads stop midway and fail to resume.

I have tried basic troubleshooting steps like clearing the cache, reinstalling the app, and checking my internet connection, but the problem persists.

If anyone has a solution or knows an alternative app with similar features, please let me know. Any guidance would be appreciated!

title: Impossibilità di aprire il mio sito
content:
Buongiorno, da stamattina quando cerco di entrare sul mio sito web (propertyhunter [.] ch) ricevo il seguente errore:

Codice di errore: MOZILLA_PKIX_ERROR_OCSP_RESPONSE_FOR_CERT_MISSING

Viene inoltre comunicato che il sito non è sicuro.

I sottodomini del mio sito ru.propertyhunter [.] ch e en.propertyhunter [.] ch sembrano non essere affetti da questo problema.

Inoltre non riscontro problemi di accesso utilizzando altri browser, il sito è bloccato solo da firefox.

Ho verificato i certificati su ssllabs.com e risulta che il grado di certificato è "A".

Il sito è su hostinger ed è sviluppato con WP Colibri builder (il dominio principale è con WP Colibri builder PRO, mentre i sottodomini sono sviluppati con la vrsione base) ed è basato su WordPress.

Non sono un tecnico per cui non ho la possibilità di intervenire sul codice.

title: I purchased "Lifetime Video DownloadHelper" Sept 15, 2024 for $28.50.  I installed it for the first time May 10, 2023 in/on Firefox and enjoyed it until it stopped working a few months ago.  Please help me retrieve my purchase registration number?
content:
I purchased "Lifetime Video DownloadHelper" Sept 15, 2024 for $28.50. I installed it for the first time May 10, 2023 in/on Firefox and enjoyed it until it stopped working a few months ago. Can someone help me retrieve my purchase info like registration number and help me learn how to get it to work as it did for the last 6 months? It seemed to run only (or best) on Firefox my preferred Browser.

Video DownloadHelper icon still appears in Firefox, but is shaded (colors no longer show) and indicates no media present.

I have reinstalled "Video DownloadHelper" several times to no avail.

Please do what you can to help me get "Lifetime Video DownloadHelper" working again. It has helped me to gather some wonderful music (and many other kinds of videos).

Best Regards,

Jim Challender 5004 Arbor Chase Dr Raleigh, NC 27616


Cell 954-551-9200 Email JimChallender@hotmail.com

title: How to delete an old Firefox account?
content: I recently created a new Firefox account using my new gmail address. I still have an old Firefox account associated with an old gmail address that was compromised; I would like to delete the old Firefox account. When I try to sign in to the old Firefox account, I'm told I'll have to sign in using my "primary" account--presumably the new account. When I sign in to the new account, I only see an option to delete the new account, which I don't want to do, as I have Firefox Relay and passwords connected to it. How do I delete (only) the old Firefox account? Thanks.

content:

title: Habilitar Plugin Java
content:
Boa Noite Estou tentando habilitar o Plugin Java no navegador Mozila para acessar os tribunais para consultas. Inicialmente fiz o seguinte procedimento:

Para habilitar o plugin Java no Firefox, pode seguir os seguintes passos: 

   Abri o Firefox    Selecionei a aba para acessar as "Ferramentas" e selecionar Complementos   Só que não achei a aba "Ferramentas" e consequentemente não encontrei a aba Complementos. Estou fazendo alguma coisa errada? Pode me ajudar?

Obrigado

Carlos O. Schneider Rio Grande do Sul - Brasil
creator: anabdireitobr
